attributes.action: Call for International action to protect the mountain gorillas of the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) after the recent slaughter from soldiers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have created this petition to urge the Prime Minister to call for International action to halt the needless slaughter of the endangered Mountain Gorillas in the Democratic Republic of Congo(DRC) There are in the region of only 700 left and this recent slaughter sets a dangerous precedent and the species now tinkers closer to extinction.
These animals are our closest relatives and it is vital that they are preserved.
